entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
